nodes.desc: [Collection Detail] Retrieve details for a collection based on its ID.
[Collection Image] Retrieve a collection's images based on its ID.
[Company Detail] Retrieve details about a company based on its ID.
[Company Logo] Retrieve the logos of a company based on its ID.
[Movie Discover] Discover new movies based on RATINGs.
[Movie Latest] Retrieve information about the most recently created movie.
[Movie Playing] Obtain a list of movies currently being shown in theaters.
[Movie Popular] Retrieve a list of currently popular movies.
[Movie Top Rated] Obtain a list of the highest-rated movies.
[Movie] Retrieve information about a movie using its ID.
[Movie Credit] Retrieve the cast and crew information for a movie using its ID.
[Movie Image] Fetch images of a movie using its ID
[Movie Keyword] Retrieve the keywords of a movie using its ID
[Movie Recommendation] Obtain a list of recommended movies related to a particular movie using its ID.
[Movie Release Date] Retrieve the release date of a movie using its ID.
[Movie Review] Retrieve user reviews for a movie.
[Movie Similar] Obtain a list of movies that are similar to a particular movie using its ID.
[Network] Retrieve detailed information about a TV network using its ID.
[Network Logo] Fetch the logos of a TV using ID
[Person Popular] Retrieve a list of popular individuals.
[Person Detail] Retrieve details of a person using ID.
[Person Image] Fetch the images of a person using ID
[Perso Movie Credit] Retrieve the movie credits for a person.
[Person TV Credit] Retrieve the TV show credits for a person.
[Search Collection]  Search and find collections.
[Search Company] Search and find companies.
[Search Movie] Search and find movies.
[Search People] Search and find movies.
[Search TV Show] Search and find TV shows.
[Trending] Retrieve trending items.
[TV On Air]  Obtain a list of TV shows that are currently on the air.
[TV Popular] Retrieve a list of the currently popular TV shows.
[TV Top Rated] Obtain a list of the highest-rated TV shows.
[TV] Retrieve details about a TV show using its ID.
[TV Credit] Retrieve the credits (cast, crew, and director) for a TV
[TV Image] Fetch the images of a TV show using its ID.
[TV Keyword] Retrieve the keywords of a TV show using its ID.
[TV Recommendation] Obtain a list of recommended TV shows for a particular TV.
[TV Review] Retrieve reviews for a TV show using its ID.
[TV Season] Retrieve detailed information about a TV season of its season number.
[TV Seanson Credits] Retrieve the credits for a TV season using its season number.
[TV Episode] Retrieve detailed information about a TV episode.
[TV Credits based on EPISODE]  Retrieve the credits (cast, crew, and guest stars) for a TV episode.
[TV Image of EPISODE] Fetch the images of a TV EPISODE.
[TV Image of SEASON] Fetch the images of a TV SEASON.
[TV Similar] Obtain a list of TV shows that are similar to a particular TV show using its ID.
